channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 11:52 The threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Cont attention, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 11:52 The threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Cont attention, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#Pokrovskaya_T territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 11:16 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 11:16 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
